outboundReferences.contextLine: Azure Container Instances can mount an Azure file share created with [[azure-file-storage]].
You can also mount **multiple volumes**: when using [[arm-templates]], you first need to define the volumes in an array.

inboundReferences.contextLine: Create a container in a container group that **mounts an Azure File share as [[azure-aci-volumes]]**.

fields.title: Operations on ACI with Cloud CLI

inboundReferences.contextLine: You can **specify external volumes** to mount within a container group. You can **map those volumes into specific paths within the individual containers** in a group. See [[azure-aci-volumes]].
